text: Picardia orchatias is a moth of the family Pterophoridae. It is known from Madagascar and South Africa. This species has a wingspan of 23mmGibeaux, 1994. Faune de Madagascar - Pterophoridae, p.121 ==References== Category:Oidaematophorini Category:Moths of Madagascar Category:Moths of Africa Category:Moths described in 1908 Category:Taxa named by Edward Meyrick
